flake8-tidy-imports.option:
Type: Flake8TidyImportsOptions/null
Status: DEPRECATED

Available Sub-options:
  - ban-relative-imports: Whether to ban all relative imports (`"all"`), or only those imports
  - banned-api: Specific modules or module members that may not be imported or accessed.
  - banned-module-level-imports: List of specific modules that may not be imported at module level, and should instead be
